d03_q.state_txt: Who are you most worried about?

message_box.copy: I don’t feel sick – so I don’t need to go to the doctor!

d11s_q.state_txt: Does anyone in their family have diabetes?

d24s_q.state_txt: Did any members of their family have heart disease under the age of 55?

d30s_q.state_txt: What is the first step to stopping diabetes?

copy.main: Go to the library and get a book!
Go to the doctor and get a check up!

message_box.copy: I don’t feel sick – so I don’t need to go to the doctor!

copy.main: Go to the beach and try surfing!

d32s_q.state_txt: What do you say if someone doesn’t want a check up because they don’t feel sick?

copy.main: “By the time you feel sick, it will be too late!”

d34s_q.state_txt: Click on a line you might use!

copy.main: Do you want to live to see your grandkids?
Do you want to have to stop working in five years?
Do you know you’ve got a time bomb inside you?
I don’t like any of these!

message_box.copy: Change what they eat and drink.

d11m_q.state_txt: Does anyone in your family have diabetes?

d24m_q.state_txt: Did any members of your family have heart disease under the age of 55?

d30m_q.state_txt: What is the first step to stopping diabetes?

copy.main: Go to the library and get a book!
Go to the doctor and get a check up!
Go to the beach and try surfing!

d32m_q.state_txt: If you don’t feel sick, you don’t need to go to a doctor!

d40_q.state_txt: What does your body use as “petrol”?

d42_q.state_txt: What controls the fuel in your body?

d44_q.state_txt: What’s it called if you’ve almost got diabetes but not quite?

d46_q.state_txt: How many Kiwis have got “Pre diabetes” ?

d50_q.state_txt: What do you do if you’re overweight?

copy.main: Eat a bit less – and more healthily

d52_q.state_txt: How do you eat more healthily?

copy.main: Go to fancy health food shops
Less pies – more whole grain bread and salad
Eat broccoli at least three times a day

d54_q.state_txt: Where can you get healthy sandwiches?

copy.main: Only in special health food shops
Lots of popular chains have them

d56_q.state_txt: To avoid diabetes, should you drink lots of fruit juice?

copy.main: Of course! It’s good for you!
No! It’s got lots of sugar!

d58_q.state_txt: To stop getting diabetes, do you have to join a gym and get all hot and sweaty?
